item.title: Visualizing Online Class Discussion Boards (redux)
item.description: In a very early post on this blog, I went through some of my incredibly kludgy attempts to visualize the discussion boards in my ENGL200: Introduction to Literature: Weird Fiction course that I have been teaching every semester since Fall of 2019. I have improved things quite a bit and made the worfklow a whole lot easier. I figured I could, once again, take everyone through the steps to see if it might be at all helpful for others with similar use-cases.
